name: Community Health Insurance Advisors
description: Offers guidance on Medicare, ACA, group, and individual health insurance. They have bilingual advisors, though the specific languages mentioned are English, Spanish, and Portuguese. It's possible they have Bengali speakers available upon request

name: Dr. Shamima Chowdhury, MD (Englewood Health)
address: Englewood Health, Englewood, NJ (specific clinic address not provided in search results)
phone: (201) 894-3700 (General Englewood Health number, specific department may vary)
description: Board-certified in internal medicine, Dr. Chowdhury speaks Bengali and Hindi in addition to English. While she is a primary care physician, her practice would be relevant for Medicare beneficiaries

name: Dr. Nisha Bengali, MD (Atlantic Health)
address: Martinsville, NJ (specific clinic address not provided in search results)
phone: (908) 647-1000 (General Atlantic Health number, specific department may vary)
description: A Family Medicine physician who speaks English. While her name is Bengali, the search results do not explicitly state she speaks Bengali. However, given her name and specialty, she may be a relevant contact for Bengali-speaking patients seeking primary care under Medicare

name: Medi-Solutions Insurance Agency LLC
address: Not explicitly stated in search results
description: Offers guidance on Medicare, health, life, and dental insurance. They emphasize personalized solutions and have extensive experience. It is possible they have Bengali-speaking staff

name: Sangha Insurance Agency
address: 1477 Oak Tree Rd Unit - 7A, Iselin, NJ 08830
description: Specializes in auto, home, health, dental, and business insurance. As an independent agency, they may be able to assist with Medicare plans

name: NJ Medicare (HealthShare360)
address: Not explicitly stated in search results, but offers meetings and webinars
description: A resource for simplifying Medicare enrollment in New Jersey, offering benefits comparisons and local meetings/webinars. They state they can help you find the right Medicare plan

name: NJ FamilyCare
description: New Jersey's publicly funded health insurance program, which includes CHIP, Medicaid, and Medicaid expansion populations. They offer multilingual support, including Bengali. This program is for those who do not have employer insurance and have income/asset limitations

name: Indian Medical Program (RWJBarnabas Health)
address: Robert Wood Johnson University Hospital Somerset, Somerville, NJ (specific department address)
description: This program is dedicated to meeting the medical needs of the Indian American population in New Jersey, offering culturally sensitive healthcare services and translation/interpretation. They can assist with medical appointments, finding specialty doctors, and navigating the healthcare system. While not exclusively Medicare, they serve a relevant demographic

name: AtlantiCare Regional Medical Center (ARMC)
address: Multiple locations in Southern New Jersey (e.g., Atlantic City, Mainland Campus)
description: AtlantiCare offers financial assistance policies and has language assistance available, including Bengali. They are a large healthcare system that would serve Medicare beneficiaries

name: Optum Medical Care
address: Multiple locations in NY and NJ
description: Optum has a network of providers in NJ that includes Bengali among the languages spoken. You can search their provider directory for specific doctors who speak Bengali and accept Medicare
